welcome_message_body: Welcome to Qaqortoq, Greenland! Known for its breathtaking natural beauty and charming small-town atmosphere, we invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heliport Airport serves as the primary hub for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Helicopter Terminal
terminals.description: The helicopter terminal at Heliport Airport caters to short-distance flights and serves as a popular mode of transportation for locals and tourists alike.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to stay connected during their travels.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heliport Airport serves as the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Heliport Airport handles all freight and cargo operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Alluitsup Paa Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
